programme.title: Network News
programme.desc: Network News is a 30min news, news about china and the world.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Ru’s financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the client’s data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriend’s wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge – will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Dream Lover
programme.desc: Ka Shing meets Kitty one day and they fall quickly in love. However, Kitty disappears shortly and when they meet years later, she is already married. To comfort himself, Ka Shing asks a mystic master to let Kitty appear in his dreams so that he can be with her constantly, even though she can only be his dream lover...

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: Fagara
programme.desc: After her father’s death, a Hong Kong girl discovers she has two hitherto unknown sisters, Branch and Cherry. Through taking up her late father’s hotpot restaurant, she reunites with her sisters by different mothers, and understands her father more from a different perspective, allowing her to finally resolve her long-time hard feelings with him.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: Only Cloud Knows
programme.desc: This romantic drama is based on the story of a real-life couple. It follows a grieving husband as he journeys to places of significance to his beloved dead wife across their New Zealand homeland.

programme.title: The White Storm 3 Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Billy works undercover in Suchat's drug cartel, while another undercover cop Wing successfully earns their trust in an incident and a brotherly bond is built among the three. When the police busts the syndicate, Suchat flees to the Golden Triangle with Billy and receives a tip-off about the betrayal within his circle of trust…

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness…

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartel’s turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brother’s hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sect’s Zhang Chui Shan’s son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Old Fox
programme.desc: In 1989, young Liao Jie and his father save for a home, unaware of rising property prices. Frustrated by poverty, he learns from their landlord Old Fox who teaches him survival in society. Liao Jie ends up hurting Old Fox with what he has learnt, but his empathy prevents him from becoming like Old Fox.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kit’s master, Debo.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Teenage Dreamers
programme.desc: Ting Ting is a student in an all-girl high school. She tries out for the school’s stage production of Romeo and Juliet with an all-boy school and promptly falls for the lead, Jackson. While Ting Ting is swept away by the excitement of her first love, Jackson turns out to be more of a player than a partner.

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the “midnight gymnasium” programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kong’s legendary detective?

programme.title: Love Never Ends
programme.desc: An empty-nest elderly man and a widowed elderly woman who collects scrap, meet unexpectedly and gradually develop feelings for each other. An elderly couple whose wife suffers from a serious illness, makes a living by selling scrap. Both these elderly couples fall deeply in love and prove that love never ends, even if there is no tomorrow!

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with disciple, Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation, and in their search for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Chang’s first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunt’s puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: The Goldfinger
programme.desc: Inspired by Hong Kong’s biggest financial scandal in the 1980s, this is a rags to riches story about Ching Yat Yin who is chairman of a listed company. With Ching’s wealth and influence on the rise, ICAC senior investigator Lau Kai Yuen is determined to investigate the case, even if it means spending 15 years in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves “The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real “Chosen Sleuth” instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Ru’s financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the client’s data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies. The biz program offers a truly global perspective, loaded with local insights.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment “Global Debate”. It features a diversity of perspectives and insights on the most important global news and stories of our time. Its face-to-face "Exclusive Interview" segment welcomes both existing big names and future players from all walks of life. World Insight with Tian Wei, always embraces changes, enriching and inspiring, hearts and minds.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly. Hundreds of state heads, diplomats, business leaders and culture icons have appeared on DIALOGUE . It reaches viewers across China and over 80 million subscribers around the world.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: Rediscovering China
programme.desc: Rediscovering China is a half-hour documentary program on CGTN. Each edition offers unique insight into various aspects of life in China today. With unrivalled access to the country's people and places, the program aims to show the global audience an inclusive and vigorous China.

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: The Heat is a daily talk show anchored from Washington, D.C. It focuses on top stories making news globally. The Heat presents tough issues from a comprehensive, balanced and international and Chinese perspective. Guests from on the spot and around the world ensure lively debate and a range of voices. Wherever the story is happening, The Heat is there.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues. We examine the changes and growth in China's domestic leagues, as the country undergoes an incredible economic transformation. Our exclusive features, "Tackling China", "CBA Stories", and "Beyond the Baseline", take you behind the scenes and closer to the top athletes in China, by providing a unique perspective on the top sports stories.

programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China’s perspective, policies and stories. The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

programme.title: Asia Today

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It features a diversity of perspectives and insights on the most important global news and stories of our time. Its face-to-face "Exclusive Interview" segment welcomes both existing big names and future players from all walks of life. World Insight with Tian Wei, always embraces changes, enriching and inspiring, hearts and minds.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: The Hangman'S Daughter
programme.desc: Narrowly escaping death, an outlaw is on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter by his side.

programme.title: Bored To Death S3
programme.desc: Jonathan runs into his nemesis; George’s daughter makes an announcement; Ray has a support-group mix-up.

programme.title: Bored To Death S3
programme.desc: Jonathan shows Emily a youthful time; George faces restaurant competition; Ray seeks painkillers and affection.

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: Just when Eddie’s life is at its lowest, he becomes host to an alien symbiote, transforming him into Venom. Will his powers be enough to defeat great evil forces?

programme.title: Ex Machina
programme.desc: An internet coder is sent to test and evaluate the capabilities and consciousness of his CEO’s experiment in artificial intelligence.

programme.title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
programme.desc: When a reporter's life needs something more, she decides to ‘shake it all up’ by taking an assignment in a war zone.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: This film follows the journey of a military man who is thrust from being one of many who oppose Hitler to the one who must kill Hitler himself.

programme.title: Hulk
programme.desc: Eric Bana is Bruce Banner, a tormented scientist whose temper periodically transforms him into a raging green monster.

programme.title: Jarhead
programme.desc: A memoir of Marine Anthony Swofford’s pre-Desert Storm experience in Saudi Arabia and stint in Kuwait.

programme.title: Champions
programme.desc: The journey of a former minor-league basketball coach who, after a series of mishaps, is ordered by court to coach a Special Olympics team.

programme.title: Genie
programme.desc: A workaholic seeks the help of a magical genie in hopes of winning back his family before Christmas.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: Thirty years after the events of the first film, a new blade runner unearths a long buried secret...

programme.title: Fast X
programme.desc: Dom Toretto and his family confront the most lethal opponent they’ve ever faced: A terrifying threat emerging from the shadows of the past.

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone plots to escape from a maximum-security CIA black-site prison with help from inmate Arnold Schwarzenegger.

programme.title: Entourage S5

programme.desc: In the far north of Norway, where western Europe and NATO border Russia, lies Kirkenes. It only has 3,500 inhabitants, but it’s a geopolitical heavyweight. A border battalion with 600 elite soldiers makes its military presence felt.

programme.desc: In the far north of Norway, where western Europe and NATO border Russia, lies Kirkenes. It only has 3,500 inhabitants, but it’s a geopolitical heavyweight. A border battalion with 600 elite soldiers makes its military presence felt.

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: How can we preserve our current flood of knowledge, data and objects for future generations? What is important, and what can go? The better storage options become, the more difficult it is to answer this question.

programme.desc: So close to Eagle Mountain, Ivandoe & Bert get hopelessly trapped by an avalanche. Their thoughts turn to how they first met and started on their Quest.

programme.title: The Heroic Quest Of The Valiant Prince Ivandoe S1
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe and Bert set off on their heroic quest and, almost immediately, a winged serpent steals their map to Eagle Mountain.

programme.title: The Heroic Quest Of The Valiant Prince Ivandoe S1
programme.desc: A fire-breathing Giant Chicken is destroying the local farmers' prize vegetables. Prince Ivandoe vows to capture the Giant Chicken, but... gets captured by her instead.

programme.desc: When Prince Ivandoe valiantly sets free Brian the Bard, he discovers he is now stuck with him... until such time that Brian saves Prince Ivandoe's life in return.

programme.desc: In an effort to impress Jezebel the thiefstress, Prince Ivandoe and Bert set off to find the elusive Centicore.

programme.title: Marcel The Shell With Shoes On

programme.title: This Is Christmas

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2
programme.desc: The Bears switch bedrooms for the night and get a glimpse of the living space of one of their brothers. But as they go deeper, hidden secrets are revealed.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2
programme.desc: To recover a missing package, the Bears get help from Ranger Tabes, an eccentric forest ranger. But her overblown sense of justice might be too much for the Bears to handle.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2
programme.desc: Feeling unappreciated, Ice Bear leaves his brothers to be the chef of a restaurant. Desperate to fill the void, Grizz and Panda look for Ice Bear's replacement.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2
programme.desc: Fed up with sharing, Panda forbids his brothers from using his cellphone any longer. But when the brothers get their own super-advanced smartphones, Panda starts to succumb to crippling jealousy.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2
programme.desc: To abide by the clothing policy of their favourite Boba shop, the Bears get some new outfits. But with new looks come new lives - including office work, fashion modeling, and even falling in love!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: During one last stop by a toy store before Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max's maiden voyage across the Atlantic, Ben runs into an old bully, Kevin 11, who now has new powers - able to transform into aliens just like Ben, such as the 'bootleg' doppelgänger of Cannonbolt-- Wreckingbolt!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: Team Tennyson goes international in the Omni-Copter and the first stop is for a hike in the Scottish Highlands, but the weather isn't just bad, it's foggy, and that means one thing and one thing only: the return of The Fogg!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: Back stateside, Ben can't get into a cat cosplay competition, Top Tail, without a costume of his own, but when he goes Rath - a new cat-like alien with an attitude - Ben's newfound wild side quickly becomes much more than he bargained for.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max next travel to Castle Bishopbrook to visit a distant relative who's royalty, but when Ben encounters a 'ghost' at the haunted home, it turns out to actually be his new rival, Kevin 11, throwing even more twisted aliens his way: Thornblade, Undertow, and Dark Matter!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: While in Paris, France, Ben catches Zombozo robbing the Louvre, but when Zombozo hypnotizes Ben to remain speechless, Ben must navigate a foreign land like a mime in order to stop the criminal clown and his travelling circus.

programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe reluctantly accepts an invitation to a Royal MidSwanner Feast.

programme.desc: B.D. Wong and Vu Mai lend their voices to this animated episode of Little Red Riding Hood, retold in a Chinese setting.

programme.desc: The Grimm Brothers' story of two hungry children and their encounter with a witch is retold with a Latino perspective.

programme.title: Taz: Quest For Burger
programme.desc: After an outlaw attacks her father and steals their town's food for the winter, a feisty Bandicoot girl named Quinn hires The Tasmanian Devil, an ill-tempered rogue with a fearsome reputation, to help track down the criminal through the wilds of Tasmania.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2
programme.desc: While trying to sail to Japan, the Baby Bears get stranded on an island. Luckily, they meet Dave and Karla, who help with survival on the island, while looking for an escape.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2
programme.desc: The Bears become terribly ill and Chloe takes it upon herself to take care of them. But things get tricky when word of the Bears' sickness goes viral.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2
programme.desc: The Baby Bears have an adventure in the sky, on a plane to Sweden. But when the Baby Bears are forced to sit in different sections of the plane, things go haywire for everyone on board.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2
programme.desc: The Bears are reunited with their pet crab, Captain Craboo. But after an unfortunate run-in with Nom Nom, the Bears may lose their pet forever.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: A trip to the South Pole goes upside down when Team Tennyson lands on the North Pole instead, but Ben quickly discovers the culprits: Solar & Polar Twain, magnetically-powered scientists who want to hold the world ransom by threatening to reverse Earth's magnetic poles!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max arrive at a Native American national park to witness the Ayasha Plinths - an ancient Stonehenge-like rock formation - but when the sinister sorcerer Hex arrives, Ben must battle against a beast Hex magically made out of huge rocks!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: Team Tennyson checks out a Samurai Museum in Tokyo, where Ben is too impatient to wait out the Calligraphy experience for the more exciting-sounding Samurai one, but when a dangerous Samurai sword is stolen from the exhibit, Ben must take on its thief - the new Big Bad in town, the Forever Knight.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: During a tour of the Japanese Robotics Museum, Ben finds hero-gone-wrong Tim Buktu 'trying to save' Tokyo from a Dragon, but has Tim finally turned over a new leaf, or is this just another one of his half-baked plans to play the part of hero?

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: During medieval times, Team Tennyson must fight to remember that they're not in the past at all, but actually at a Renaissance-esque faire- where 'King Zombozo' has hypnotized its guests into thinking they live in the past!

programme.title: The Heroic Quest Of The Valiant Prince Ivandoe S2
programme.desc: Princess Syllabob, the blobby daughter of Axalotly, King of the Deep, has been carried off by a gang of gulls and discarded on the forest floor.

programme.title: The Heroic Quest Of The Valiant Prince Ivandoe S2
programme.desc: Struck down by a poisonous turnip, Prince Ivandoe & Bert must seek a cure from the Wise Wizard of Wisdom.

programme.title: The Heroic Quest Of The Valiant Prince Ivandoe S2
programme.desc: Feral and her gang of cat-thieves have stolen Prince Ivandoe's map to Eagle Mountain. Cupcake, the pink-poodle survivalist offers to train Prince Ivandoe to become a Jungle Warrior

programme.title: The Heroic Quest Of The Valiant Prince Ivandoe S2
programme.desc: Whilst travelling through the notoriously dangerous Forest of Outlaws, Prince Ivandoe is repeatedly Princenapped!

programme.title: The Heroic Quest Of The Valiant Prince Ivandoe S2
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe is a prisoner in the castle dungeon of Jezabel's mother, Grizabella - the unpredictable and slightly terrifying 'Queen of Thieves'.

programme.title: Hop
programme.desc: An out-of-work slacker accidentally injures the Easter Bunny (voiced by Russell Brand) and must take him in as he recovers.

programme.title: The Lego Ninjago Movie
programme.desc: Led by a kung fu master, the secret ninja warriors must defeat an evil warlord in an epic showdown that will unleash their inner power.

programme.title: Honey

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2
programme.desc: After Panda gets injured on the basketball court, the Bears invite Charlie to be on their basketball team. But when Charlie gets too good, he starts to ruin all the fun of the game.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: After beating the Warbot and finding Vilgax inside, Ben's 'secret voices' worsen and begin to affect his sleep. Gwen discovers Ben sleepwalking and using campsite items to create his own Junkbot.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: After the Junkbot shoots the Omnitrix and it begins glowing neon-blue, an imprisoned Vilgax explains it is now a gateway through which the Fulmini Empire will invade Earth.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: While inside the Omnitrix, Ben and Vilgax must work together if they are to close the gateway, but once the Fulmini leader, the High Override, appears, even that might not be enough.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: While Ben struggles to avoid the High Override's mind control, Max and Gwen enter the Omnitrix to lend a hand. Once they discover Ben is not who he seems, Max and Gwen must go all out to help him.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: When Grandpa Max's engineer buddy Phil Billings gifts Team Tennyson the Omni-Copter - a state of the art flying vehicle that can transport the Rustbucket for overseas adventures.

programme.title: A Waltons' Thanksgiving
programme.desc: The Walton family prepares for the Harvest Festival Fair in town. But this year, a young boy arrives that will dramatically change the Waltons' lives.

programme.desc: Each Bear gets offbeat items at a local yard sale. Their new possessions send them on their own separate adventures.

programme.desc: A doctor tells the Bears to go on a 'cleanse' to improve their health. But when Grizz realises he can only eat what grizzly bears eat, he starts to lose his mind.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3

programme.title: Ben 10 S3

programme.title: Ben 10 S3

programme.title: Lopez Vs Lopez S2
programme.desc: The stress of Mayan and Quinten's new jobs leads to an unexpected amount of conflict... and pizza; George and Rosie find a way to benefit from the mayhem.

programme.title: Ghosts S4
programme.desc: GHOSTS is a comedy about Samantha and Jay who decided to convert a huge estate they inherited into a bed & breakfast - only to find it's inhabited by the many spirits who now call it home.

programme.title: The Goldbergs S1
programme.desc: On the eve of the annual high school talent show, Beverly and Murray square off over Barry's plan to perform his martial arts routine, while Pops encourages Erica to sing. Guest starring Tim Meadows.

programme.title: Fire Country S3
programme.desc: Fire Country season 3 isn't turning down the heat - Bode faces tougher challenges which will force him to walk the straight and narrow in this unfair world.

programme.title: Entertainment Tonight
programme.desc: The foremost authority on breaking entertainment news since its debut, ENTERTAINMENT TONIGHT is the No. 1 syndicated entertainment newsmagazine in the world.

programme.title: Alert: Missing Persons Unit S1
programme.desc: When someone close to Mike comes to the MPU to ask for their help in finding an employee of his who has gone missing, their case lands them in the middle of an FBI investigation.

programme.title: Ghosts S4
programme.desc: GHOSTS is a comedy about Samantha and Jay who decided to convert a huge estate they inherited into a bed & breakfast - only to find it's inhabited by the many spirits who now call it home.

programme.title: Menggapai Matahari
programme.desc: Mobil yang dikendarai Tika, kekasih Rhoma Irama, menabrak Selvy hingga tewas. Rhoma Irama mengaku sebagai pengendara mobil tersebut untuk meyelamatkan kekasihnya dari penjara. Indra, kekasih Selvy, berusaha merebut Tika dari Rhoma Irama, sedangkan Beny Compo, kakak Selvy, berusaha menghancurkan karir musik Rhoma Irama sebagai pelampiasan dendam

programme.title: Setannya Kok Masih Ada
programme.desc: Dedi dan Beno yang bekerja di kamar mayat berkenalan dengan Maya. Maya yang baru saja kehilangan kakeknya mendapatkan warisan rumah berikut perkebunannya. Namun karena menemukan banyak keanehan di rumah itu, Maya menyewa Dedi dan Beno untuk menjaga rumah warisan tersebut.

programme.title: Ponirah Terpidana
programme.desc: Sedari kecil, Ponirah dianggap membawa kesialan bagi orang sekitarnya. Ibunya meninggal ketika melahirkannya. Lalu sang kakak meninggal saat memboncenginya naik sepeda. Lalu ia dibawa kabur oleh pelayannya yang setia, diselamatkan dari amukan ayahnya yang kalap ingin membunuhnya. Ketika dewasa, ia tergoda oleh rayuan seorang calo pencari wanita muda untuk dijadikan wanita penghibur di Jakarta. Ponirah pun bertekad menjadi wanita penghibur termahal.

programme.title: Menerjang Badai
programme.desc: Merupakan kelanjutan dari film "Orang-orang di Atas Angin". Di film ini Bastian berkisah mundur mengenai masa lalu ia dan Zainal pada anak-anaknya. Zainal, anak seorang pemilik perusahaan diusir ayahnya saat hendak menolong Bastian, anak seorang narapidana. Mereka berjuang bersama sampai akhirnya terlibat dalam komplotan penyelundup emas. Siapa menyelamatkan siapa menjadi bahan pertengkaran juga pada saat cerita berakhir di masa kini.

programme.title: Kangen
programme.desc: Pertemuan dua remaja yang diawali kesinisan tanpa sengaja berubah menjadi sebuah hubungan romantis

programme.title: Lorong
programme.desc: Menceritakan kejanggalan sebuah rumah sakit tempat Mayang melahirkan. Misteri yang terjadi pada Mayang dan Reza ini berhubungan dengan keberadaan bayi mereka.

programme.title: 3 Srikandi
programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang 3 altlet panahan putri yang akan bersaing di olimpiade di Soul. Namun krisis pelatih yang dialami mengharuskan Donald kembali melatih timnas Indonesia untuk bertanding setelah pensiun. Kerja keras dan disiplin Donald diterapkan kepada ketiga atlet perempuan panahan itu. Hingga mereka siap diberangkatkan ke Seoul.

programme.title: Bing Slamet Dukun Palsu
programme.desc: Bercerita tentang Bing Slamet yang menjalani profesi sebagai dukun palsu dan telah menipu banyak orang termasuk Ateng dan Iskak. Karena Merasa ditipu, orang-orang yang pernah menjadi korban dukun tersebut bermaksud menangkapnya, tapi keduluan polisi.

programme.title: Cintaku Di Rumah Susun
programme.desc: Sebuah sketsa karikatural tetang kehidupan di rumah susun sederhana yang kehidupan penghuninya beraneka ragam. Dalam lingkungan ini terjadi persahabatan dan pertikaian antar penghuni yang penuh rahasia dan intrik

programme.title: Jamila Dan Sang Presiden
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan bernama Jamila tiba-tiba menjadi headline di semua pemberitaan nasional. Ia mengaku membunuh seorang pejabat tinggi dan menolak mengajukan grasi kepada Presiden.

programme.title: Cowok Bikin Pusing
programme.desc: 3 sahabat sejati yang selalu mendukung untuk semua hal, termasuk kisah sakit hati dengan makhluk yang namanya Cowok.

programme.title: Satu Kecupan
programme.desc: Film ini bercerita tentang Desi, seorang pelajar SMU yang begitu mendambakan ciuman dari Ardi sang kekasihnya. Ia melakukan berbagai hal untuk mendapapatkan ciuman tersebut.

programme.title: Hattrick
programme.desc: Bercerita tentang turnamen futsal internasional. Kebetulan tahun ini diadakan di Indonesia, maka dicarilah pemain-pemain terbaik dari seulurh Indonesia untuk dididik dan diikutkan dalam turnamen ini.

programme.title: Baby Blues
programme.desc: Sepasang suami-istri, Andika dan Dinda tidak menyangka bahwa merawat bayi tidak semudah yang dibayangkan. Hal ini membuat Dinda mengalami sindrom baby blues yang kemudian memicu perdebatan dan pertengkaran.

programme.title: Pokun Roxy
programme.desc: Kisah tentang arwah gentayangan, pocong dan kuntilanak yang kerap meneror warga kampung. Fenomena ini disiasati Acong. Acong pun meminta Jupe dan Bedul berpura-pura menjadi pocong dan kuntilanak. Adegan ini direkam Acong pakai handphone, yang kemudian ia pamerkan kepada warga. Masyarakat geger dengan aksi Acong.

programme.title: Menggapai Matahari Ii
programme.desc: Kelanjutan dari cerita Menggapai Matahri. Persaingan antara Rhoma Irama dan Beny Compo terus berlanjut. Beny Compo tak hanya ingin menghancurkan karir musik Rhoma Irama, tapi juga ingin mencelakainya secara fisik.

programme.title: Rumah Hantu Pasar Malam
programme.desc: Misteri pembunuhan terjadi di pasar malam desa Sumber Sari. Namun daya tarik pasar malam tersebut seakan tidak pernah berhenti menarik pengunjungnya, termasuk kelima sahabat yang sedang mengunjungi desa tersebut. Teror pun kemudian kembali terjadi. Satu persatu korban berjatuhan dan mengancam nyawa kelima sahabat tersebut.

programme.title: Pengantin Pantai Biru
programme.desc: Bercerita tentang sekumpulan orang yang berlibur ke sebuah pantai yang indah namun dipercaya kental dengan unsur mistis. Peringatan terhadap kehadiran mahluk gaib sedari awal sudah diperingatkan, namun mereka tidak menggubrisnya, sampai satu per satu dari mereka menghilang.

programme.title: Ken Arok-Ken Dedes
programme.desc: Ken Arok, yang dibesarkan oleh seorang perampok, berhasil diterima menjadi prajurit di Tumapel. Disana ia berjumpa dengan Ken Dedes, istri Tunggul Ametung. Niat untuk menyingkirkan Tunggul Ametung pun muncul dibenaknya, untuk mendapatkan Ken Dedes.

programme.title: Punk In Love
programme.desc: Diawali oleh percobaan bunuh diri yang menghebohkan kota Malang, empat anak Punk, Arok, Yoji, Mojo, dan Almira tanpa pikir panjang memutuskan untuk pergi ke Jakarta untuk menyatakan cinta pada seorang cewek pujaan

programme.title: Hijab
programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang keempat sahabat Anin, Bia,Tata dan Sari. Mereka mempunyai gaya berpenampilan berbeda-beda kecuali Anin yang tidak memakai Hijab. Kegalauan mereka semakin meningkat karena mereka berhijab dan mendapatkan uang dari "Ikut Suami". Namun hal itu dibantah dengan mereka membangun bisnis Hijab dan berhasil. Dengan penghasilan mereka yang melebihi para suaminya, keharmonisan rumah tangga merekapun mulai diuji.

programme.title: Selamanya
programme.desc: Aristha berjumpa dengan kekasih lamanya, Bara, di kantor polisi. Bara, yang merasa bersalah karena menjerumuskan Aristha ke dunia narkoba, berusaha keras menarik Aristha dari dunia itu

programme.title: Love You Love You Not
programme.desc: Sebuah komedi romantis tentang Amira, guru les Bahasa Inggris, dan Juki, pemuda Betawi yang geragasan. Semua dimulai saat Suchin, gadis Thailand yang juga pacar Juki, meminta bantuan Amira, guru les Bahasa Inggrisnya, untuk menyampaikan ke Juki bahwa mereka putus karena ia mendapat pekerjaan di Amerika. Selama ini ia dan Juki pacaran dan berkomunikasi lewat bahasa gerak gerik. Begitu Amira menyampaikan pesan Suchin, Juki tidak terima dan memaksa Amira mengajarinya Bahasa Inggris, agar bisa menyusul Suchin. Karena takut dengan Juki, Amira mengajar privat Juki. Di saat yang sama, pemuda lain, Taufan, mendekati Amira.

programme.title: El
programme.desc: Dafychi (Aurelie Moeremans), gadis berkepribadian ganda, tak pernah menyangka bahwa hidupnya yang monoton dan membosankan, tiba-tiba jadi lebih berwarna sejak bertemu Mario Adipati (Achmad Megantara), pengusaha muda sukses yang terkenal otoriter dan berhati dingin. Mereka berdua dipersatukan berkat Dafyna (Aurelie Moeremans), alter ego Dafychi. Mario merasa dirinya ditakdirkan untuk melengkapi bagian yang hilang dari gadis tersebut, walau mereka harus bertahan melewati rintangan yang menguji kesetiaan mereka.

programme.title: Hantu Juga Selfie
programme.desc: Helsi meninggal karena selfie, ia meneror temen-teman semasa hidupnya ketika mereka melakukan selfie. Hal ini membuat teman-temanya ketakutan, apa lagi bukan hanya sosok Helsi yang ada dalam foto namun hantu-hantu kocak lainya juga ada saat mereka berlibur di sebuah pulau.

programme.title: Paku
programme.desc: Berkisah tentang Fahmi yang kehilangan istri tercintanya. Ia tidak ikhlas dan memutuskan mengunakan paku kuntilanak untuk membangkitkan istrinya lagi dari kematian. Semenjak istrinya bangkit kembali, banyak kejadian aneh yang datang. Hingga istrinya melahirkan anak perempuan yang dimana tidak sepenuhnya manusia.

programme.title: Suami-Suami Takut Istri
programme.desc: Demi mengabulkan permintaan para istri yang meminta berbulan madu ke Bali, para suami pun mengajak para istri ke Bali. Walaupun sebenarnya ada maksud lain dibalik kebaikan para suami. Mereka berencana untuk menghadiri pertunjukan super sexy dari Trio Ganas. Namun akhirnya para istri mengetahui adanya rencana lain dari para suami.

programme.title: Aach...Aku Jatuh Cinta
programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang kisah pasangan kekasih Yulia dan Rumi yang tumbuh bersama sejak kecil. Namun keadaan berubah ketika orang tua Rumi usahanya bangkrut dan Rumi meningalkan Yulia. Suatu saat mereka ditemukan kembali, namun dengan perasaan yang bimbang karena masing-masing sudah mempunyai calon pasangan hidupnya.

programme.title: Dunia Mereka
programme.desc: Film ini menceritakan tentang sebuah band yang terdiri dari beberapa orang yang mempertemukan mereka karena selera musik yang sama. Namun dalam perjalanan mereka, berbagai masalah pun berdatangan.

programme.title: Bidadari Pulau Hantu
programme.desc: Evan dan Gesti melakukan pemotretan pre-wedding di pulau yang dikenal sebagai pulau hantu. Pulau ini terkenal dengan sosok hantu perempuan yang membawa celurit dan menggunakan gaun pengantin. Pasangan ini mengajak Remon seorang fotografer, Remi, pria penata rias kemayu, Vidi, sepupu Gesti, dan Tilda. Di hari pertama pemotretan, hantu perempuan bergaun pengantin sudah menteror rombongan Evan dan Gesti

Lensa Indonesia Malam
programme.desc: Program berita yang menghadirkan informasi terkini, rangkuman peristiwa yang terjadi dari malam hingga dini hari dengan dua segmen khusus, yaitu Lensa Dunia dan Lensa Arena yang membahas berbagai informasi olahraga di Indonesia maupun mancanegara

programme.title: Catatan Seputar Investigasi
programme.desc: Sebuah program buletin crime news, menyoroti berbagai tindak kriminalitas yang terjadi di tanah air serta memberikan tips-tips untuk menghindari kejahatan.

programme.title: Terang Kasih
programme.desc: Siraman rohani Kristen yang berkaitan dengan kehidupan untuk mendekatkan diri kepada Tuhan Yesus Kristus. Program ini akan dibagi menjadi beberapa bagian, antara lain kesaksian, renungan, serta konseling yang akan dipandu oleh dua orang host

programme.title: STB (Sangat Tidak Biasa)
programme.desc: Program ini menghadirkan kompilasi informasi berbagai macam issue dan topik yang akan dibahas dari berbagai sisi dan dipaparkan oleh penyulih suara.

programme.title: Movinesia
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang Menghadirkan sederet film pilihan untuk menemani aktivitas anda dengan dimeriahkan oleh para pemain & artis papan atas berbakat, dengan cerita ringan seputar kehidupan remaja.

programme.title: Mina Mila
programme.desc: Serial animasi religi islami yang menceritakan kehidupan sehari-hari antara dua anak kembar Mina dan Mila. Program ini akan mengajak penonton untuk belajar, melakukan hal-hal baik, bermain, serta bernyanyi bersama.

programme.title: Omar & Hana
programme.desc: Omar & Hana adalah serial animasi anak bergenre hiburan pendidikan dengan tokoh kakak-beradik yang bahagia, ingin tahu, dan penuh kasih. Mereka menarik teman-teman di seluruh dunia ke dunia mereka yang menakjubkan.

programme.title: Ibra Berkisah
programme.desc: Ibrahim atau Ibra adalah murid pesantren yang santun dan selalu mengajak teman-temannya untuk meneladani Nabi Muhammad SAW, dia pun sejak kecil sudah tinggal di pesantren. Ibra memiliki teman bernama Tokek dan Hoho. Tokek adalah anak yang lucu dan periang, sedangkan Hoho adalah seorang anak Jakarta yang dilahirkan dari keluarga kaya raya, sifatnya manja dan tidak mengerti sama sekali tentang islam. Selama di Pesantren, Hoho sekamar dengan Ibra yang mana di perkenalan awal mereka, Hoho menganggap remeh Ibra yang dia anggap sebagai anak kampung. Tapi ternyata dari Ibra lah Hoho banyak mendapatkan pelajaran hidup dan kisah-kisah teladan Nabi Muhammad Shalallahu Alaihi Wassalam.

programme.title: Riko The Series
programme.desc: Animasi lokal yang mengangkat keseharian seorang anak bernama Riko bersama sahabat robotnya, Q110 untuk menemukan dan mempelajari hal-hal baru disekitarnya. Q110 bertugas menjelaskan kepada Riko hal-hal baru yang mereka temukan. Berkat Q110, Riko mempelajari banyak pengetahuan soal ilmuan-ilmuan muslim dari penjuru dunia, kekuasaan Allah sang Maha Pencipta, dan tentunya banyak hal lainya.

programme.title: Adit Sopo Jarwo
programme.desc: Animasi Indonesia, berisikan kisah kehidupan sehari-hari masyarakat Indonesia yang dipenuhi dengan pengetahuan, kelucuan, kisah persahabatan, serta nilai persatuan, kesatuan, dan kebudayaan. Tokoh dalam cerita ini diantaranya Adit (tokoh utama, seorang anak laki-laki), Adelya (adik Adit), teman-teman Adit yakni Dennis, Mitha, dan Devi. Mereka harus berhadapan dengan duo orang dewasa (Sopo & Jarwo) yang selalu mencari celah untuk mendapat keuntungan tanpa usaha. Perbedaan paham atau cara pandang merupakan bumbu utama yang memicu “perseteruan” dan "kelucuan". Beruntung di antara mereka ada H. Udin, ketua RW bijaksana yang selalu menjadi penengah dan memberikan petuah bijak yang disampaikan dengan ringan serta lugas sehingga mampu mengembalikan suasana gaduh menjadi teduh.

programme.title: Pj Masks
programme.desc: Serial animasi ini berkisah tentang tiga anak normal yang berkegiatan pada siang hari. Namun pada malam hari, mereka akan menjadi pahlawan yang menggunakan topeng. Biasanya, masalah itu terjadi pada siang hari saat mereka sekolah. Dan tugas mereka, menyelesaikan masalah itu pada malam harinya. Akan ada banyak ide dan strategi yang mereka gunakan dalam memecahkan masalah. Mereka sangat mengenali kekuatan dan kelemahan masing-masing. Mereka memutuskan beraksi pada malam hari karena menganggap waktu tidur merupakan waktu yang tepat untuk memerangi kejahatan.

programme.title: Oki Dan Nirmala
programme.desc: Oki dan Nirmala mengisahkan sebuah kehidupan di negeri dongeng , dengan Oki, Nirmala, dan Pipiyot sebagai tokohnya . Oki sebagai kurcaci berpakaian hijau , Nirmala sebagai peri cantik yang baik hati , dan Pipiyot sebagai penyihir jahat . Kisah petualangan Oki dan Nirmala menghibur sekaligus memberi nilai kebaikan yang bisa ditiru

programme.title: Bioskop Liburan - Boonie Bears: Guardian Code
programme.desc: Anak beruang muda Briar dan Bramble hidup bahagia di Crystal Peaks bersama ibu mereka Barbara, sampai suatu hari terjadi kebakaran. Briar melihat Barbara meninggalkan gedung yang terbakar dan dia tidak pernah kembali. Kini, kakak beradik beruang dewasa dan Vick sedang mengawal seorang ilmuwan bernama Charlotte ke pusat penelitian. Selama perjalanan mereka, Briar terkejut melihat Charlotte memiliki batu amber yang pernah dimiliki ibunya.

programme.title: Tawa Satwa
programme.desc: Program yang menampilkan kompilasi video lucu hewan yang viral di media sosial dan di-react secara kekinian oleh voice over talent dengan karakter beragam yang akan menambah kelucuan.

programme.title: Boboiboy
programme.desc: Sebuah program animasi yang mengisahkan Boboiboy dan teman-temannya yakni Gopal, Ying, dan Yaya yang masing-masing memiliki kekuatan super. Dengan kekuatan yang dimiliki mereka mencegah Adu Du mencuri biji kakao Tok Aba yang digunakan sebagai sumber energi. Selain itu, Boboiboy dan teman-temannya menjadi pahlawan super dalam menumpas kejahatan dan menjaga kedamaian Bumi.

programme.title: Petronix Defenders
programme.desc: Matt, Emma, Jia & Tim merupakan siswa biasa di Sekolah Dasar Doodlewitz, tetapi ketika para hewan dalam bahaya, mereka menyelinap keluar untuk menjadi Pembela Petronix (Petronix Defenders). Mereka memiliki ransel berteknologi tinggi yang dapat berubah menjadi robot hewan peliharaan. Mereka bersama-sama memiliki misi untuk menyelamatkan hewan yang terancam punah.

programme.title: Pokemon Ultimate Journeys
programme.desc: Tantangannya semakin besar bagi Ash, Goh, dan Chloe saat mereka maju menuju tujuan mereka! Saat turnamen Pokémon World Coronation Series semakin memanas, pelatihan intensif disiapkan untuk Ash, Pikachu, dan teman-teman Pokémon mereka. Sementara itu, Goh memulai serangkaian misi percobaan yang menantang untuk menjadi anggota Project Mew. Kemudian saat Chloe dan Eevee mempelajari berbagai jalur evolusi yang dapat diambil Eevee, akankah mereka dapat mengambil keputusan tentang masa depannya?

programme.title: Boboiboy The Movie
programme.desc: Movie animasi ini menceritakan tentang Sekelompok Alien jahat yang menamakan diri mereka 'Geng Tengkotak' datang ke Bumi untuk menculik Ochobot. Tujuan mereka menculik Ochobot untuk mencari asal kekuatan dari Ochobot, yaitu sebuah sfera kuasa. BoBoiBoy dan kawan-kawan, termasuk Adu Du dan Probe, harus berusaha membebaskan Ochobot sekaligus menghalangi Tengkotak mendapatkan sfera kuasa tersebut.

programme.title: Si Bocil Trang Quynh
programme.desc: Kisah lucu dan jenaka tentang kehidupan Quynh dan orang-orang disekitarnya. Sebagai anak yang nakal tetapi cerdas dan banyak akal, Quynh dan teman-temannya akan membawa pengalaman hidup yang penuh warna di pedesaan Vietnam pada abad ke-18. Menyoroti juga tentang nilai-nilai budaya rakyat dan hubungan dengan keluarga, teman, guru, siswa, dan lingkungan. Trang Quynh akan membawa tawa bagi penonton dan mengajarkan mereka tentang keintiman, persahabatan, dan nilai-nilai kemanusiaan.

programme.title: Adit Sopo Jarwo
programme.desc: Animasi Indonesia, berisikan kisah kehidupan sehari-hari masyarakat Indonesia yang dipenuhi dengan pengetahuan, kelucuan, kisah persahabatan, serta nilai persatuan, kesatuan, dan kebudayaan. Tokoh dalam cerita ini diantaranya Adit (tokoh utama, seorang anak laki-laki), Adelya (adik Adit), teman-teman Adit yakni Dennis, Mitha, dan Devi. Mereka harus berhadapan dengan duo orang dewasa (Sopo & Jarwo) yang selalu mencari celah untuk mendapat keuntungan tanpa usaha. Perbedaan paham atau cara pandang merupakan bumbu utama yang memicu “perseteruan” dan "kelucuan". Beruntung di antara mereka ada H. Udin, ketua RW bijaksana yang selalu menjadi penengah dan memberikan petuah bijak yang disampaikan dengan ringan serta lugas sehingga mampu mengembalikan suasana gaduh menjadi teduh.

programme.title: Ejen Ali
programme.desc: Serial animasi dengan tokoh utama bernama Ali yang tidak sengaja menjadi agen Meta Advance Tactical Agency (MATA). Ali membuktikan diri bahwa Ia mampu menjadi agen MATA dan mengalahkan musuh bersama Alicia dan Paman bakar

programme.title: Mechamato
programme.desc: Sebuah program animasi yang menceritakan seorang anak laki-laki bernama Amato dalam menemukan sebuah pesawat ruang angkasa penjara berisi robot-robot jahat yang telah jatuh ke bumi. Salah satu robot tersebut adalah MechaBot yang memiliki kemampuan untuk mengubah objek sehari-hari menjadi perangkat berteknologi tinggi. Amato berhasil menginovasi MechaBot menjadi master MechaBot. Sejak itu, MechaBot dan Amato mulai bekerja sama untuk menemukan dan menangkap robot jahat.

programme.title: Si Paling Trending!
programme.desc: Program TV berjenis informasi documentary yang mengangkat suatu hal atau issue yang sedang trending, dibahas dari berbagai sisi, dan dipaparkan oleh VO ( Voice Over ). Setiap segmen menampilkan fakta terunik, asal usul, fenomena yang trending.

programme.title: Terkepo-Kepo
programme.desc: Program informasi dokumenter, menyajikan berbagai informasi yang dekat dengan kehidupan sehari-hari dan dibahas dari berbagai sudut pandang disertai dengan pemaparannya. Selain menghibur, program ini juga kaya akan pengetahuan sehingga akan menambah banyak wawasan bagi pemirsa.

programme.title: Layar Aksi
programme.desc: Sebuah action movie asia , yang menampilkan aksi bela diri kung-fu dari para pendekar shaolin yang mengalahkan kejahatan.

programme.title: Bioskop Natal
programme.desc: SHAUN THE SHEEP: THE FLIGHT BEFORE CHRISTMAS, TIMMY TIME SPECIAL : TIMMY'S CHRISTMAS SURPRISE, TIMMY TIME SPECIAL : TIMMY'S SEASIDE RESCUE

programme.title: Bioskop Liburan - Boonie Bears : Mystical Winter
programme.desc: Badai salju yang sangat lebat di Gunung Pohon Pinus membuat segalanya membeku. Makhluk aneh namun agak familiar muncul dan menyebabkan kenangan masa muda Bramble muncul kembali. Sekelompok orang asing datang mencoba memburu makhluk misterius itu, meninggalkan tempat ini dalam kekacauan. Dari teman bermain masa kecil hingga sekarang menjadi musuh, ternyata Briar, Bramble dan Logger Vick memiliki sejarah yang lebih dalam dari yang kita bayangkan. Sekarang mereka menghadapi musim dingin paling keras yang pernah mereka alami, bersama dengan musuh jenis baru yang mengancam untuk menghancurkan seluruh gunung, akankah mereka terus bermusuhan satu sama lain, atau berjabat tangan dan berjuang bersama untuk mempertahankan tanah air mereka?

programme.desc: BoBoiBoy Galaxy merupakan sebuah kisah tentang robot-robot Power Sphera yang dibuat untuk memberikan kekuasaan besar kepada pemiliknya. Namun, proyek Power Sphera akhirnya dianggap sebagai proyek yang berbahaya dan dibatalkan, sedangkan Power Sphera yang lain melarikan diri dan bersembunyi di berbagai pelosok galaksi.

programme.title: Layar Aksi
programme.desc: Sebuah action movie asia , yang menampilkan aksi bela diri kung-fu dari para pendekar shaolin yang mengalahkan kejahatan.

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: Centers on a CIA officer who is fingered as a Russian sleeper spy. She eludes capture by superiors who are convinced she is out to assassinate the president. While trying to reunite with her family, she struggles to prove someone else is the traitor.

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: A prequel focusing on a young James T. Kirk and Mr. Spock, chronicling their first meeting at Starfleet Academy and their first space mission.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: K, an officer with the Los Angeles Police Department, unearths a secret that could create chaos. He goes in search of a former blade runner who has been missing for over three decades.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: A gladiator who rose up from his beginnings as a slave races against time in order to rescue his beloved before an erupted volcano destroys the whole city.

programme.title: Street Fighter
programme.desc: A commando colonel leads a covert mission to rescue kidnapped relief workers from a psychotic warlord.

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: Centers on a CIA officer who is fingered as a Russian sleeper spy. She eludes capture by superiors who are convinced she is out to assassinate the president. While trying to reunite with her family, she struggles to prove someone else is the traitor.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A murder inside the Louvre, and clues in Da Vinci paintings, lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years, which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into The Spider-Verse
programme.desc: Enter a universe where more than one wears the mask.

programme.title: Around The World In 80 Days
programme.desc: It is 1872, and a British inventor, a Chinese thief and a French artist set off to circumnavigate the globe in 80 days. They travel by land, air, sea, and in-line skates in order to beat the clock and finish where they started.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
programme.desc: Bella is heartbroken when the Cullen family decide to move away in order to put a stop to her relationship with vampire Edward. She seeks comfort in friend Jacob, and starts to wonder if there could be more between them.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
programme.desc: As a string of mysterious killings grip Seattle, Bella, whose high school graduation is fast approaching, is forced to choose between her love for vampire Edward and her friendship with werewolf Jacob.

programme.title: Gangs Of New York
programme.desc: In 1863, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

programme.title: XXX
programme.desc: Extreme sports athlete Xander Cage (Triple X) is recruited by the government to infiltrate a Russian crime ring led by Yorgi, sparking a high-stakes adventure across Europe.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in LA. He must find a way to save both himself and one last victim.

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: In the 25th century, a virus has decimated mankind. Political conflicts, though, have taken their toll. Into this setting, acrobatic assassin Aeon Flux makes a dangerous trek to take out the government's top leader.

programme.title: XXX
programme.desc: Extreme sports athlete Xander Cage (Triple X) is recruited by the government to infiltrate a Russian crime ring led by Yorgi, sparking a high-stakes adventure across Europe.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne (Matt Damon) is back in a non-stop race around the globe from a new generation of skilled CIA operatives as he finally learns the truth behind his mysterious past.

programme.title: The One
programme.desc: A cop must fight his evil double from a parallel universe in order to save himself and the world.

programme.title: Nim's Island

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 1
programme.desc: Bella and Edward find their lives in turmoil after discovering she is pregnant. It's not long before her health is suffering, while meanwhile the wolf pack suspect the child could be their downfall.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 2
programme.desc: The birth of Bella and Edward’s child ignites forces that threaten to destroy them all as tensions build toward all-out war between the Cullens and the Volturi in the thrilling conclusion to the epic phenomenon.

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: Centers on a CIA officer who is fingered as a Russian sleeper spy. She eludes capture by superiors who are convinced she is out to assassinate the president. While trying to reunite with her family, she struggles to prove someone else is the traitor.

programme.title: Maharaj
programme.desc: Based on a real-life historic court case, a bold journalist questions a revered leader's immoral behavior.

programme.title: Kaabil
programme.desc: This is the story of a blind couple who lived, laughed and loved just like everyone in this world. Until one day, a terrible tragedy struck. Release Year: 2017 Director: Sanjay Gupta

programme.title: Arjun Reddy
programme.desc: Arjun Reddy, a successful young medical surgeon, sets out on the path of self-destruction when his lady-love is forced to marry another man.

programme.title: Koffee With Karan S06
programme.desc: Noted for its fresh and witty appeal, the show is hosted by Karan Johar where celebrities are interviewed in the show's trademark informal style.

programme.title: Ms Dhoni - The Untold Story
programme.desc: A boy from Ranchi, M S Dhoni, decides to pursue his dream of playing cricket for India despite initially working for the Indian Railways to please his father.

programme.title: Betaab
programme.desc: Love story of two youngsters who fall in love despite the status gaps between their families and must face the odds to stay together. Release Year: 1983 Director: Rahul Rawail

programme.title: Pathaan
programme.desc: An Indian RAW agent named Pathaan discovers a planned attack on India led by a mercenary group, and must team up with an ally to stop them while facing numerous betrayals and destruction. Release Year: 2023 Director: Siddharth Anand Awards: 2023 Winner Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Award - Favorite Movie, 2023 Nominee IFF Award - Best Film

programme.title: Lootera
programme.desc: During 1953, Pakhi, an aristocrat's daughter, falls in love with an archaeologist. However, unbeknownst to her, he leads a double life that threatens their relationship. Release Year: 2013 Director: Vikramaditya Motwane Awards: Filmfare Awards- Best Playback Singer - Female- Monali Thakur for the song 'sanwaar loon' . Zee Cine Awards- Best ActreSS- Sonakshi Sinha.

programme.title: Biwi No.1
programme.desc: Prem leads a double life - loving father and husband and a cheater. His life takes a turn when his wife finds out the truth. Release Year: 1999 Director: David Dhawan Awards: Filmfare Awards - Nominated for Best Film

programme.title: Dolly Ki Doli
programme.desc: The story revolves around a conwoman, Dolly who cons men into marrying her and on the marriage night steals their wealth and runs away. Release Year: 2015 Director: Abhishek Dogra Awards: 1 win and 3 nominations

programme.title: Crakk Jeetegaa Toh Jiyegaa
programme.desc: The journey of a man from the slums of Mumbai to the world of underground extreme sports.

programme.title: Cuttputlli
programme.desc: An inspector and a police officer are on a mission to track down a child abduction racket. Release Year: 2022 Director: Ranjit M. Tewari Awards: 2022 Winner Critics Choice Award - Best Content - Thriller

programme.title: Border
programme.desc: A small Indian battalion faces the Pakistani Army which consists of 2000 armed soldiers with tanks during the 1971 war. Release Year: 1997 Director: J.P. Dutta Awards: Filmfare Awards-Best Director-J.P. Dutta , Best Lyricist- Javed Akhtar for song sandeshe aate hain, Best New Comer Male - Akshaye Khanna , Best Action , Best Sound Recording.Screen Weekly Awards-Best Film , Best Director - JP Sharma

programme.title: Koffee With Karan S06
programme.desc: Noted for its fresh and witty appeal, the show is hosted by Karan Johar where celebrities are interviewed in the show's trademark informal style.

programme.title: Jhooth Bole Kauwa Kaate
programme.desc: Abhyankar is an orthodox head of his family, so his daughter is unable to introduce the young man she loves. She concocts a hilarious scheme to do so. Release Year: 1998 Director: Hrishikesh Mukherjee

programme.title: Main Tera Hero
programme.desc: A messy, entertaining romantic story of Sheenu and Sunaina. Angad, the corrupt cop, wants to forcibly marry Sunaina. Release Year: 2014 Director: David Dhawan Awards: 2015 Winner Apsara Award- Best Comic Actor- Varun Dhawan,

programme.title: The Big Bull
programme.desc: Hemant Shah, a man from a humble background, aspires to become rich. He soon devises a plan to exploit the loopholes in the banking system to fulfil his ambitions. Release Year: 2021 Director: Kookie Gulati Awards: 2022 Winner OTT Film Award - Best Supporting Actor - Female - Ileana D'Cruz

programme.title: Thoda Pyaar Thoda Magic
programme.desc: An angel, a man and 4 orphans come together to bring you a story filled with fun, excitement, tears, love and magic. Release Year: 2008 Director: Kunal Kohli

programme.title: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
programme.desc: A man with a magnanimous spirit tries to take a young mute Pakistani girl back to her homeland to reunite her with her family. Release Year: 2015 Director: Kabir Khan Awards: 2016 Winner Popular Award - Best Film, 2016 Winner Popular Award - Best Film, 2016 Winner Screen Award - Best Film

programme.title: Mission Mangal
programme.desc: Based on an extraordinary true story of India's finest scientists who rose above all the hardships and failures to make India the only country to reach Mars in its first attempt. Release Year: 2019 Director: Jagan Shakti

programme.desc: Ruslan has been working as a travel agent for the last 3 years, but he has never left his own country. Ruslan is joined by Sharon, who has a one-of-a-kind trip planned.

programme.title: Harry Potter: Wizards Of Baking (S1)
programme.desc: James and Oliver Phelps challenge the teams to create a six-foot-tall showpiece inspired by the Great Hall! Who will be crowned champion?

programme.title: Say Yes To The Dress With Tan France (S1)
programme.desc: Being of dual heritage, Bride Gemma is insecure about taking her place within either culture, so Tan's there to give her confidence to follow her heart.

programme.title: Home Town (S5)
programme.desc: Ben and Erin create a modern oasis for a New Orleans couple who love to entertain.

programme.title: Beachside Brawl (S2)
programme.desc: Brian Malarkey and Eric Adjepong face off in a fast-food glow up for the biggest advantage yet. Then, the teams throw down by creating a coastal-themed picnic.

programme.title: Say Yes To The Dress: The Big Day (S3)
programme.desc: Mike Sorrentino's sister, Melissa, is getting married and planning the wedding is a family affair. Her 3 brothers also have a huge surprise in the works!

programme.title: Fun Taiwan First Timer (S1)
programme.desc: First time international traveler and adrenaline junkie Jeremy Dumont hails from South Carolina America where he spends his time training as a mixed-martial arts fighter.

programme.title: The Elf On The Shelf: Sweet Showdown (S1)
programme.desc: The Scout Elves fly over their favourite places as they return home, so the finalists "elf-ify" a famous landmark for a chance to win $25,000!

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines (S7)
programme.desc: Joanna celebrates her love of mushrooms! She makes a delicious mushroom bisque, then follows it up with fresh French bread and chocolate molten cake.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines (S6)
programme.desc: Joanna prepares a delicious peach-themed menu made from peaches she grew on her farm. It features a seared pork chop with a side of peach chutney.

programme.title: Next Baking Master: Paris (S1)
programme.desc: Stephanie Boswell and Ludo Lefebvre task the bakers with creating buttery mashups inspired by Julien Abourmad and Emmanuel Gunther's "cruffin."

programme.title: Cake Wars Christmas: Holiday Song
programme.desc: The four remaining teams of cake artists return to battle, and in round one, they'll be challenged to take Christmas intergalactic and show what happens when Santa is in space.

programme.title: Buddy Vs. Duff (S4)
programme.desc: Buddy Valastro and Duff Goldman create cakes capturing scenes from the classic Christmas ballet, "The Nutcracker." Both teams feature the Rat King in their creations.

programme.title: Silos Baking Competition: Holiday Edition (S1)
programme.desc: Joanna Gaines hosts Silos Baking Co.’s first holiday cookie competition! Home bakers compete to have their treat featured at Silos and win $25,000

programme.title: Recipe Lost And Found (S1)
programme.desc: Host Casey Corn helps a family recreate their great-grandmother Antonia's homemade lasagne with paper-thin layers and a "sneaky" white sauce.

programme.title: Miracle Workers S3
programme.desc: Small-town reverend Ezekiel Brown enlists outlaw Benny the Teen to lead his people west along the Oregon Trail.

programme.title: Miracle Workers S3
programme.desc: The wagon train must ford a dangerous river, leading to a moral struggle between Ezekiel and Benny over the soul of the group. Meanwhile, Prudence and Todd meet hipster pioneers living wagonlife.

programme.title: East New York S1
programme.desc: Captain Yenko’s connection to a witness could be instrumental in locating a missing child.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5
programme.desc: The guys take name-calling to new heights while playing receptionists, and then ask for bogus donations. And one Joker loses more than just his dignity after getting a shave that's too close for comfort.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q show who's boss while working the counter at a fast food joint, and then whisper sweet nothings to grocery store customers. Then, the big loser assists a cow in labor and nearly winds up buying the farm.

programme.title: Arrow S2
programme.desc: Oliver confronts a new threat when bombs start to go off in Starling City...planted by a man named Shrapnel, who's next targeting Sebastian Blood's Unity Rally.

programme.title: Major Crimes S4
programme.desc: The squad tries to identify a possible murder victim from his skeletal remains, only to find he may have a criminal past of his own. A new friend helps Rusty with the Alice case.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11
programme.desc: Amy records Sheldon talking in his sleep and tries to convince him he can be more easygoing. Meanwhile Raj and Stuart compete to win the heart of Bernadette's coworker.

programme.title: Friends S3
programme.desc: After breaking up with Richard, Monica uses her free time to make jam and consider insemination via a sperm bank.

programme.title: Justice League (2017)
programme.desc: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his newfound ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to find and recruit a team of metahumans to stand against this newly awakened threat. But despite the formation of this unprecedented league of heroes – Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and The Flash – it may already be too late to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions.

programme.title: Ninja Assassin
programme.desc: A secret oriental clan trains an orphan child as a killer expert in martial arts. When he grows up, he runs away and becomes the target of the organization, which also spies on an agent who looks into political crimes in Berlin. In order to live, they must both hide. And fight.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S7
programme.desc: Missy steps up, Mary has a surprise for George, and Sheldon finds his dorm occupied.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2
programme.desc: Learn how to get gum out of your hair and how to survive a zombie apocalypse. Plus, welcome a broomstick to the All Star Club, find out the real way to remove permanent marker, and discover a new Hack from History: the lawnmower.

programme.title: Mane Number 13
programme.desc: Five IT professionals, forced to move from their house, face terrifying incidents in their new home. They must determine if it's haunted or if someone is orchestrating the fear.

programme.title: Gaon Ki Ladaai
programme.desc: A respected chieftain of a village falls in love with the daughter of a headmaster and decides to marry her. His engagement is interrupted by a jailor.

programme.title: Muqaddar Ka Badshah
programme.desc: An unfortunate union leader labours to earn money but he is implicated in numerous crimes and has to run from the police.

programme.title: Tele Shopping
programme.desc: Discover a variety of products and enjoy easy shopping from home. Perfect for those who prefer shopping without leaving their house. Tune in for convenience.

programme.title: Jodidar
programme.desc: Ganesh, an elephant, seeks to avenge the death of his previous master at the hands of 3 poachers. After he kills two, the third abducts Munna.

programme.title: Dandnayak
programme.desc: Bankhelal, who started from nothing, rises to become a notorious criminal. His only fear is Inspector Vishal, who has sworn to bring him to justice.

programme.title: Khiladi 420
programme.desc: Ritu is smitten by Dev Kumar and gets married to him. Distraught after losing her father, she realises that Dev is a completely different person who may also be the reason behind her father's death.

programme.title: I..
programme.desc: A successful model's life deteriorates after a faulty injection causes a hunchback. He plots revenge against those who ruined his career and personal life.

programme.title: Maayon
programme.desc: A gang of idol smugglers plans to steal a hidden treasure in an ancient Hindu temple, that has mysterious secrets.

programme.title: Gaddaar
programme.desc: Best friends Sunny and Vijay see their relationship suffer when they both fall in love with the same girl. As a result, Sunny tries to use Vijay as a pawn in his devious schemes.

programme.title: Astra The Weapon
programme.desc: A brigand uses his illegal weapons to commit mass murder on a bus. ACP Ajay is appointed to track down the criminals, in this fast-paced, action-packed police thriller.

programme.title: Chandramukhi Ka Bhool Bhulaiya Mahal
programme.desc: An NRI and his wife decide to stay in his ancestral home. Soon, inexplicable occurrences cause him to call a psychiatrist to help solve the mystery.

programme.title: Gupt
programme.desc: Sahil is falsely accused of murdering his stepfather. He's imprisoned but manages to escape from jail. A fearless cop is on his trail.
